bio.work: I'm a full-stack engineer with experience managing large scale projects and teams in e-commerce, insurance and finance. I work primarily in TypeScript with React but have also worked with Scala and Python.
bio.personal1: Outside of work, I enjoy hiking, running and learning languages.

professionalExperience.2024: I successfully completed my part-time MSc in Computer Science at the University of Bath. I undertook a dissertation on implementing a Hypergraph Neural Network for early diagnosis of dementia.
professionalExperience.2022: After Depop was acquired by Etsy for $1.6b, I made the decision to focus on my technical skill and knowledge by moving into a full time Software Engineering role.
professionalExperience.2018: Headhunted for the role, I joined my second start up Depop as Software Development Manager, leading on agile and technical processes and managing senior engineers.
professionalExperience.2017: Entering the world of start ups, I led an agile transformation for Tide, a successful fintech SME banking provider.
professionalExperience.2016: I moved to DLG as the Scrum Master for their car insurance offerings, working with a distributed team across Poland, India and the UK.
professionalExperience.2015: Starting my IT career in AXA PPP, a private healthcare insurer, I worked as a Business Analyst and Scrum Master on a large project to migrate the key workflow system.
